languages.text: "Какое зверство — зашить рот человеку! Немедленно уберите швы".
"What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."
languages.original_text: "Какое зверство — зашить рот человеку! Немедленно уберите швы".

traits.locale_text: "What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth closed! Take those stitches out immediately."
"What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth closed! Take those stitches out immediately."
"What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."
"What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."

languages.text: 「人間の口を縫い合わせるなんて、残酷すぎる！今すぐその糸を外せ」
languages.original_text: "What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."

traits.locale_text: 「人間の口を縫い合わせるなんて、残酷すぎる！今すぐその糸を外せ。」

languages.text: «¡Coserle la boca a un hombre es de una crueldad monstruosa! Quítenle esos hilos ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: "What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."

traits.locale_text: «¡Coserle la boca a un hombre es de una crueldad monstruosa! Quítenle esos hilos ahora mismo».

languages.text: “把嘴用线缝起来，这实在是太残忍了！赶紧把线拆了。”
languages.original_text: "What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."

traits.locale_text: “把嘴用线缝起来，这实在是太残忍了！赶紧把线拆了。”

languages.text: "Was ist das für eine monströse Grausamkeit, den Mund eines Mannes zuzunähen? Befreit ihn umgehend von den Fäden."
languages.original_text: "What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Was ist das für eine monströse Grausamkeit, den Mund eines Mannes zuzunähen? Befreit ihn umgehend von den Fäden."

languages.text: « Quelle horrible cruauté que de coudre la bouche d'un homme ! Qu'on lui retire immédiatement ces sutures. »
languages.original_text: "What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle horrible cruauté que de coudre la bouche d'un homme ! Qu'on lui retire immédiatement ces sutures. »

languages.text: "Bir insanın ağzını dikmek ne canavarca bir zalimlik! O dikişleri derhâl sökün."
languages.original_text: "What monstrous cruelty to sew a man's mouth shut! Take those stitches out immediately."

traits.locale_text: "Bir insanın ağzını dikmek ne canavarca bir zalimlik! O dikişleri derhâl sökün."
